Name: BENS016 - List of Room Types
Output_template:
{"lookup_validation":"0","systemID":"5774fa2c7f695","systemName":"CustomerAccount","query":"select a.Sequ, a.room as display, a.rname as name
from
(select '11' as Sequ, 'Living rooms' as room, 'livingroom' as rname union
select '12' as Sequ, 'Bedrooms' as room, 'bedroom' as rname union
select '13' as Sequ, 'Bedsitting rooms' as room, 'bedsit' as rname union
select '14' as Sequ, 'Bathrooms or shower rooms' as room, 'bathroom' as rname union
select '15' as Sequ, 'Toilets' as room, 'toilet' as rname union
select '16' as Sequ, 'Kitchens' as room, 'kitchen' as rname union
select '17' as Sequ, 'Other rooms' as room, 'other' as rname) a
where CHARINDEX(a.rname,{alreadySelected}) = 0
or {currSelected} = a.rname","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes"}
